original_text: And Amaziah strengthened himself, and led forth his people, and went to the valley of salt, and smote of the children of Seir ten thousand.
korean_text: 아마샤가 담력을 내어 그의 백성을 거느리고 소금 골짜기에 이르러 세일 자손 만 명을 죽이고

sentences.original_text: and went to the valley of salt
and smote of the children of Seir ten thousand
sentences.korean_translation: 세일 자손 중 일만 명을 쳤더라
